DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find safety effectiveness Glycolic Acid Chemical Peels compare Salicylic Acid Chemical Peels treatment melasma .
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study Testing Salicylic Acid Peels Versus Glycolic Acid Peels Treatment Melasma
DOC.detailed_description: Participants study patient clinically diagnose least 2 x 2 cm patch melasma side face ( forehead cheek ) . One half subject 's face randomly select receive 4 treatment 30 % glycolic acid peel half face receive 4 treatment 30 % salicylic acid peels/ week 0 , 4 , 8 , 12 . Follow visit week 16 . This study pilot study design determine feasibility procedure .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects age 18 year old 2 . Subjects least 2 x 2 cm patch melasma side face ( forehead cheek ) 3 . Subjects general good health 4 . Subjects must willing able understand provide inform consent use tissue communicate investigator 5 . Subjects must willing apply treatment option melasma course study 1 . Subjects 18 year age 2 . Subjects pregnant and/or lactate 3 . Subjects unable understand protocol give inform consent 4 . Subjects diagnose mental illness 5 . Subjects concurrent active uncontrolled disease facial area ( i.e uncontrolled acne ) 6 . Subjects chemical peel past 3 month 7 . Subjects use prescribe retinoid past 3 month 8 . Subjects bleed disorder 9 . Subjects history abnormal wound heal 10 . Subjects history abnormal scarring
